addLogicalContract(string,address).details: function that allows the Dao to add a logical contract in the registry

addStorageContract(string,address).details: function that allows the Dao to add a storage contract in the registry

deleteLogicalContract(string).details: function that allows the Dao to delete a logical contract in the registry

deleteStorageContract(string).details: function that allows the Dao to delete a storage contract in the registry

deployAndAddContract(bytes,uint256,strin.details: function that allows to create a new contract and add it to the registry

deployAndUpdateContract(bytes,uint256,st.details: function that allows to create a new contract and update it to the registry

isOwnerDao().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

setAllowedContracts(string,string,bool).details: function that allows to add or eliminate the link between a storage and a logical contract

transferOwnershipDao(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwnerDao: The address to transfer ownership to.

updateStorageContract(string,address).details: function that allows the Dao to update a storage contract in the registry
